name: Aurum Artificer
description:
Submission for the GameTV 2021 Game Jam.

Use the artificer to fire protons and neutrons to make gold and heavier nuclei. Just try to find a good balance between the number of protons and neutrons or the nuclei will decay. The heavier the nucleus you make and collect, the more you will score. Bonus for making gold!

Uses real properties of all the elements and their isotopes from Hydrogen to Oganesson.

Use the gamepad to control the artificer, shoot bullets of protons and neutrons, and collect nuclei.

Controls:

  • Right Trigger: Hold down for charged fire. Press for normal fire.
  • A Button: Quick fire
  • Right Stick: Move
  • Left Stick: Aim
  • Left/Right Bumpers: switch bullet
  • Left Trigger: Brake
  • Escape or Start: Pause

Change Log:

  • 1.0: Release
  • 1.1: Fixed display errors in instructions menu. Fixed bug with player movement that caused player to go out of control. Fixed bug where bonus from making gold was not being added.
